description: Provides a high-level view of your AWS Systems.

panels.description: Monitors the structure and status of AWS organization accounts and their association within organizational units.

targets.uql:
parse-json
| scope "organizations"
| mv-expand "AccountsRoot"="Accounts"
| project "Accounts Root: Number"="AccountsRoot.Name"

parse-json
| scope "organizations"
| mv-expand "AccountsRoot"="Accounts"
| mv-expand "OUsL1"="OrganizationalUnits"
| mv-expand "AccountsL1"="OUsL1.Accounts"
| project "Accounts Level 1: Number"="AccountsL1.Name"

parse-json
| scope "organizations"
| mv-expand "AccountsRoot"="Accounts"
| mv-expand "OUsL1"="OrganizationalUnits"
| mv-expand "AccountsL1"="OUsL1.Accounts"
| mv-expand "OUsL2"="OUsL1.OrganizationalUnits"
| mv-expand "AccountsL2"="OUsL2.Accounts"
| project "Accounts Level 2: Number"="AccountsL2.Name"

panels.title: üî¥Organizations: Statsüõ∏

targets.uql:
parse-json
| mv-expand "NumberOfServicesAccessible"
| project "Services Accessible Number :"="NumberOfServicesAccessible"

parse-json
| mv-expand "NumberOfServicesNotAccessed"
| project "Services Not Accessed Number :"="NumberOfServicesNotAccessed"

panels.description: Displays a hierarchical view of AWS Organizational Units (OUs) and their policies, monitoring configuration status across multiple levels.

targets.uql:
parse-json
| scope "organizations"
| mv-expand "PolicyTypesRoot"="PolicyTypes"
| project "üÜîOrg ID: Root"="Id", "OU Name: Root"="Name", "üìÑPolicy Type"="PolicyTypesRoot.Type", "Policy Status"="PolicyTypesRoot.Status"

parse-json
| scope "organizations"
| mv-expand "OUsL1"="OrganizationalUnits"
| project "üÜîOrg ID: Root"="Id", "OU Name: Root"="Name", "üÜîOU ID: Level 1"="OUsL1.Id", "OU Name: Level 1"="OUsL1.Name"

parse-json
| scope "organizations"
| mv-expand "OUsL1"="OrganizationalUnits"
| mv-expand "OUsL2"="OUsL1.OrganizationalUnits"
| project "üÜîOrg ID: Root"="Id", "OU Name: Root"="Name", "üÜîOU ID: Level 1"="OUsL1.Id", "OU Name: Level 1"="OUsL1.Name", "üÜîOU ID: Level 2"="OUsL2.Id", "OU Name: Level 2"="OUsL2.Name"

panels.description: Displays AWS organizational account details, including ID, name, email, status, and hierarchy, to manage configuration comprehensively.

targets.uql:
parse-json
| scope "organizations"
| mv-expand "AccountsRoot"="Accounts"
| project "üë§Account ID: Root"="AccountsRoot.Id", "Account Name: Root"="AccountsRoot.Name", "üìßAccount Email: Root"="AccountsRoot.Email", "Account Joined Method: Root"="AccountsRoot.JoinedMethod", "Account Status: Root"="AccountsRoot.Status", "Account Joined Timestamp: Root"="AccountsRoot.JoinedTimestamp"

parse-json
| scope "organizations"
| mv-expand "OUsL1"="OrganizationalUnits"
| mv-expand "AccountsL1"="OUsL1.Accounts"
| project "üÜîOU ID: Level 1"="OUsL1.Id", "OU Name: Level 1"="OUsL1.Name", "üë§Account ID: Level 1"="AccountsL1.Id", "Account Name: Level 1"="AccountsL1.Name", "üìßAccount Email: Level 1"="AccountsL1.Email", "Account Joined Method: Level 1"="AccountsL1.JoinedMethod", "Account Status: Level 1"="AccountsL1.Status", "Account Joined Timestamp: Level 1"="AccountsL1.JoinedTimestamp"

parse-json
| scope "organizations"
| mv-expand "OUsL1"="OrganizationalUnits"
| mv-expand "OUsL2"="OUsL1.OrganizationalUnits"
| mv-expand "AccountsL2"="OUsL2.Accounts"
| project "üÜîOU ID: Level 2"="OUsL2.Id", "OU Name: Level 2"="OUsL2.Name", "üë§Account ID: Level 2"="AccountsL2.Id", "Account Name: Level 2"="AccountsL2.Name", "üìßAccount Email: Level 2"="AccountsL2.Email", "Account Joined Method: Level 2"="AccountsL2.JoinedMethod", "Account Status: Level 2"="AccountsL2.Status", "Account Joined Timestamp: Level 2"="AccountsL2.JoinedTimestamp"

panels.title: üî¥Organizations: Accountsüìú

targets.uql:
parse-json
| scope "ServiceControlPolicies"
| mv-expand "PolicyTargets"="Targets"
| project "üìÑPolicy Type"="PolicySummary.Type", "üë•Target Type"="PolicyTargets.Type", "üë§Target ID"="PolicyTargets.TargetId", "üë§Target Name"="PolicyTargets.Name", "Policy ID"="PolicySummary.Id", "üìÑPolicy Name"="PolicySummary.Name", "üëÄDetails"="Content", "Policy Desc"="PolicySummary.Description", "AWS Managed"="PolicySummary.AwsManaged", "Policy ARN"="PolicySummary.Arn"

parse-json
| scope "AccessDetails"
| extend "OUs"=split("EntityPath",'/')
| project "Total Authenticated Entities"="TotalAuthenticatedEntities", "üåêRegion"="Region", "Org ID"="OUs[0]", "üÜîOrg ID: Root"="OUs[1]", "üÜîOU ID: Parent"="OUs[2]", "üë§Account ID"="OUs[3]", "Service Name"="ServiceName"

matcher.options: Total Workforce Users Total Workforce Users

targets.uql:
parse-json
| scope "identity_center"
| mv-expand "Workforce"="Users"
#| summarize "Total Workforce Users"=count("Workforce.DisplayName") by "Workforce"
| project ":"="Workforce.DisplayName"
#| count

parse-json
| scope "identity_center"
| mv-expand "Workforce"="Users"
| mv-expand "WorkforceAccAssignments"="Workforce.AccountAssignments"
#| summarize "Total Workforce Users"=count("Workforce.DisplayName") by "Workforce"
| project ":"="WorkforceAccAssignments"
#| count

parse-json
| scope "PermissionSets"
| project ":"="Name"

parse-json
| scope "PermissionSets"
| project ":"="PermissionsBoundary.CustomerManagedPolicyReference.Name"

parse-json
| scope "identity_center"
| project "Instance Name"="Name", "IDP Store ID"="IdentityStoreId", "üë§Owner Account ID"="OwnerAccountId", "Status", "Created Date"="CreatedDate", "Instance Arn"="InstanceArn"

parse-json
| scope "identity_center"
| project "Instance Name"="Name", "IDP Store ID"="IdentityStoreId", "Owner Account ID"="OwnerAccountId", "Status", "Created Date"="CreatedDate", "Instance Arn"="InstanceArn"

parse-json
| scope "identity_center"
| mv-expand "Workforce"="Users"
| mv-expand "WorkforceAccAssignments"="Workforce.AccountAssignments"
| mv-expand "WorkforceAccAEmails"="Workforce.Emails"
| mv-expand "WorkforceAccJoinedGroup"="Workforce.JoinedGroup"
#| mv-expand "WorkforceAccName"="Workforce.Name.FamilyName"
#| mv-expand "WorkforceAccPermissionSet"="WorkforceAccAssignments.PermissionSet"
| project "üë§Display Name"="Workforce.DisplayName", "IDP Store ID"="Workforce.IdentityStoreId", "üë§Workforce Name"="Workforce.UserName", "üìßEmail"="WorkforceAccAEmails.Value", "Workforce ID"="Workforce.UserId", "üë•Group Name"="WorkforceAccJoinedGroup.DisplayName", "Group Desc"="WorkforceAccJoinedGroup.Description", "Group ID"="WorkforceAccJoinedGroup.GroupId", "üë§Assigned Account ID"="WorkforceAccAssignments.AccountId", "Assigned Type"="WorkforceAccAssignments.PrincipalType", "Assigned Principal ID"="WorkforceAccAssignments.PrincipalId", "üìÑPermSet Name"="WorkforceAccAssignments.PermissionSet.Name", "‚è≥PermSet SessionDuration"="WorkforceAccAssignments.PermissionSet.SessionDuration", "PermSet ARN"="WorkforceAccAssignments.PermissionSet.PermissionSetArn"

parse-json
| scope "PermissionSets"
| mv-expand "MgmtPolicies"="AttachedManagedPolicies"
| mv-expand "CustPolicies"="CustomerManagedPolicyReferences"
| mv-expand "InlinePolicies"="InlinePolicy"
| project "üìÑPermSet Name"="Name", "‚è≥Session Duration"="SessionDuration", "üìÑMgmt Policy"="MgmtPolicies.Name", "Mgmt Policy ARN"="MgmtPolicies.Arn", "üìÑCustomer Policy"="CustPolicies.Name", "üìÑInline Policies"="InlinePolicies", "üîìPermissions Boundary"="PermissionsBoundary.CustomerManagedPolicyReference.Name", "Created Date"="CreatedDate", "PermSet Arn"="PermissionSetArn"

parse-json
| mv-expand "RoleDetails"="RoleDetailList"
| project "Total Roles :"="RoleDetails.RoleName"

parse-json
| mv-expand "RoleDetails"="RoleDetailList"
| project "Total Boundaries :"="RoleDetails.PermissionsBoundary"

targets.expression:
filter eventSource in ["organizations.amazonaws.com", "sso.amazonaws.com", "signin.amazonaws.com", "iam.amazonaws.com", "access-analyzer.amazonaws.com"]
| fields @timestamp, @logStream, @message, eventVersion, userIdentity.type, coalesce(userIdentity.invokedBy, userIdentity.principalId, userIdentity.accountId) as InvokedBy, eventTime, eventSource, eventName, eventType, awsRegion, sourceIPAddress, userAgent, errorCode, errorMessage, eventID, @requestParameters, additionalEventData, requestID, readOnly, eventType, apiVersion, managementEvent, recipientAccountId, recipientAccountId.serviceEventDetails.serviceAccountId, eventCategory, tlsDetails.tlsVersion, tlsDetails.cipherSuite, tlsDetails.clientProvidedHostHeader
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 50

title: üöÄAWS Configuration Management
